name: Assault Laser
text:
At the start of a combat you are participating in you may exhaust this card to produce 2 hits against your opponent.
After 1 or more of your non-fighter non-infantry unit is destroyed roll 1 die for 1 of the destroyed unit on a result of 6 or higher produce 1 hit against your opponent.

name: Bacterial Weapons Systems
text:
After 1 of your opponents ships are destroyed you may exhaust this card to destroy 2 infantry in the space area of the active system.
This card counts as either a red or green prerequisite.

name: Hypernet Gates
text: After you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your structures you may exhaust this card to treat all systems with your structures as adjacent till the end of your turn.

name: Plasma Radial Shielding
text:
If you win a combat in a system with 3 or more non-fighter ships you may move 1 ship with a cost of 4 or fewer out of the active system into an adjacent system with any of your ships.
This card counts as either a red or green prerequisite.

name: Planetary Defense Network
text:
At the start of the status phase you may remove 1 PDS from 1 planet you control and place it on another planet you control in or adjacent to that system.
This card counts as either a red or blue prerequisite.

name: Bio-Redesign Systems
text: After the move ships step of the tactical action if you have ships in the active system you may exhaust this card to remove 1 of your opponents ships in the active system and place a matching unit from your reinforcements in the active system.

name: Gene Data Network
text:
At the start of the status phase you may place 1 infantry on each planet with 1 or more structures.
This card counts as either a green or blue prerequisite.

name: Neural Implants
text:
At the start of your turn you may remove 1 of your infantry from the game board to gain 1 trade good.
This card counts as either a green or yellow prerequisite.

name: Carrier Life Pods
text:
Each of your non-fighter ships without the capacity stat gain the capacity stat.
Apply +1 to the capacity value to each of your units with capacity.

name: Transit Fighter Pods
text: At the start of your turn during the action phase you may exhaust this card to remove up to 4 of your fighters from the game board and place them in up to 4 systems with any of your ships.
